attributes.action: To stop the government suspending the power of the house of Lords
attributes.background: This is to stop the government taking away the power of the house of Lords

rejection.details:
You may be interested in signing this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/116430

If that's not what you want, you could start a new petition calling for a more specific action. You'll need to give your full name to start a petition.
